title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: His lady,who had been active in the stratagem, was subjected to similar severities, as werealso the minister of Kinneff and his courageous spouse.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Arriving with her precious charge at Kinneff, the minister buriedthe relics of royalty under the pulpit of his church, and visited them from time totime, in order to wrap them in fresh packages, and preserve them from injury.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: As their provisionsbegan to fail, the Governor foresaw that further defence must speedily becomeimpossible; and, with the assistance of Mr. Granger, minister of Kinneff, heformed a stratagem for securing the ancient and venerable regalia from the dishonour which threatened them.
